Author: ideal_coin
Title: [ANN] [ICO] IdealCoin - Cognitive Platform And Social Media [Bounty & Airdrop]
Body: IdealCoin - Cognitive Platform And Social Media  Website: IdealCoin Website  Whitepaper: IdealCoin Whitepaper   Social Links: Reddit Twitter Facebook t.me/ideal_coin      About IdealCoin: IdealCoin is a digital currency that influencers can use in the PayMHO digital social platform. IdealCoin will be processed and protected by algorithms for immediate use.  These digital commodities are produced by large numbers of INFLUENCERS generating a critical mass of information. These INFLUENCERS can then accumulate, own, transfer, sell, trade or even use these assets as currency, benefiting from the usual guarantees and protections established by todayâ€™s digital tokens: valuable resources in this era of monetized information and digitalization.  About PayMHO: PayMHO is a digital social media platform where Influencers can actively participate in the generation of information and content while earning monetary benefits. After little more than a brief introduction, any individual can become a professional Influencer and start earning money regularly, engaging with an audience, and generating value that companies and organization will be interested in purchasing.  With each click, Influencers will generate bits of information that will build up into a chain of data that will eventually increase in value. We call this process crafting. Each crafting is linked together in hash chains, producing millions of pieces of secure, useful and valuable data, which in turn generate a critical mass of information.  Influencers retain ownership and control of their generated information, and by participating on the network, they will be playing their part in the digital age in a way that is fun, easy and enjoyable. As the system generates a data chain from the activities of hundreds of thousands of Influencers, it rewards Influencers by transforming each bit of information into a Digital Value Unit that we call a Talent.  What is PayMHO YouTube Video Explanation  About Talent: Talent are value units generated in the PayMHO platform that can be used to acquire goods and services within the PayMHO platform, invest in new knowledge exchanged with other Influencers, transfer resources to other Influencers on the network instantly and efficiently, and invest in businesses, causes, and projects. Talents can also be changed into the Influencer's own currency.  Talents can be used by third parties to purchase the information generated by Influencers. If Influencers or third parties want to use their Talents off the PayMHO platform, they can exchange their Talents for IdealCoin.     Tokenomics Name: IdealCoin Symbol: IDL Total Supply: 2,200,000,000 ICO Hard Cap: 85,050,000 ICO End Date: November 30th, 2018     Bounty Coming soon!     Airdrop Coming soon!     Common Questions:  What is IdealCoin and what are the advantages? IdealCoin is a commodity that is mandatory to reach PayMHO profile information ecosystem and created only by people while crafting their profiles in the platform. PoC (Proof of craft) protocol: Design by Dean Protocol 444 Blockchain. In other words, IdealCoin must be used to buy processed data from the PayMHO platform.  How does IdealCoin solve the issues in the Influencer space? IdealCoin will give the chance to the influencers to monetize their profiles. The influencers will be able to sell their earned coins into the crypto space or to PayMHO customers to get Fiat in exchange.  Where can I buy IdealCoin? In the ICO stage, you can buy it on our website, IdealCoin.io, and after the ICO, you will be able to buy it on exchanges. You can also use the PayMHO system to exchange talents for IdealCoin.  EDIT: We have an announcement on the state of the bounties https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5065177.new#new

Title: [ANN] [ICO] IdealCoin - Cognitive Platform And Social Media [Bounty & Airdrop]

Author: frogpoet
Title: [ANN] [ICO] IdealCoin - Cognitive Platform And Social Media [Bounty & Airdrop]
Body: I thought this was curious and decided to share it.  There is a steemit article about idealcoin which is a bit old and appears to have been based off of a mangling of an earlier version of the whitepaper (a version from October 2018).  for example, here's a paragraph from IdealCoin's current whitepaper (from page 7, available here : https://idealcoin.io/assets/whitepaper3.pdf) :  "Those who wish to consult or use the PayMHO services must pay INFLUENCERS to gain access to their profiles. Having paid, CLIENTS will be free to extract the desired statistics, obtaining more information than they could have hoped for thanks to the high degree of market profiling. There is no risk to INFLUENCERS of invasion of privacy."  and here is what appears to be a similar, but rather humorous attempted rendering of the same paragraph in the steemit article (available here : https://steemit.com/crypto/@kingseen/ideal-coins-what-is-pay-mho) :  "Those who wish or need to ask or use the services of Pay MHO platform have to pay the leaders to get the accurate entry to their currency. After paying, purchasers will be capable to extract the essential content for free, getting more info than they could expect on the method to a sharp degree of profiling in the marketplace. There is no hazard of interfering with segregation."  I have to wonder what sort of "translate into language X then back into english" procedures the steemit author went through in order to write his article
